Package CAMs

Class CampCommitteeMemberRegistrationCamps

java.lang.Object
CAMs.CampCommitteeMemberRegistrationCamps
All Implemented Interfaces:
CAMs.RegistrationCamps
public class CampCommitteeMemberRegistrationCamps extends Object implements CAMs.RegistrationCamps
Implements the RegistrationCamps interface and provides methods specific to camp registration for Camp Committee Members.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas

    • inputConfirmation

      public static boolean inputConfirmation(String message)
      Prompts the user for confirmation by displaying a message and reading a single character input. Accepts 'Y' or 'y' as confirmation, and any other character as rejection.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display as a prompt for confirmation.
      Returns:
      True if the user confirms with 'Y' or 'y', false otherwise.
